definition: to prepare/get ready/to provide or equip
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

pinyin: bei4 yong4 er4 ji2 tou2 hu1 xi1 qi4

sentences.english: Dice tomatoes and shred basil leaves, set aside.
sentences.chinese: 番茄切粒，紫苏叶切丝备用。
排骨汆水后以冷水洗净备用。

sentences.english: Wash pork spare-rib. Blanch the spare-rib in boiling water, remove.
sentences.chinese: 小排骨洗净，放入滚水中烫过，取出备用。

sentences.english: Commenced bunkering into reserve bunker tanks.
sentences.chinese: 开始向备用燃料舱装燃料。

sentences.english: Take a spare tire along in case of need.
sentences.chinese: 翻译你的汽车上有备用轮胎吗？

sentences.english: Rinse the prawns thoroughly, devein, wipe to dry, set aside.
sentences.chinese: 花虾洗净，挑肠，抹干备用。

sentences.english: Heat wok with oil, deep-fry drumsticks until golden, dish up and drain excess oil, set aside.
sentences.chinese: 烧热油镬，下鸡槌炸至金黄，盛起隔油备用。

sentences.english: Are all disbursements, except from petty cash, made by check?
sentences.chinese: 是否所有的报销，除了备用金外均使用支票支付？

sentences.english: He unpacked his 72-hourbag, then repacked it. Did he have enough toothpaste and spare socks?
sentences.chinese: 他有足够的牙膏和备用的袜子吗？

sentences.english: The PORV' backup valve is opened to lower the pressure.
sentences.chinese: 减压阀的备用阀门被打开，减少压力。

sentences.english: Therefore, in its origin, Standby was a substitution of bank guaranties.
sentences.chinese: 因此，从起源上来讲，备用证的产生是出于替代。

sentences.english: The continue generation and maintain back-up subculture with the two good proliferation.
sentences.chinese: 将增殖良好的两管虫体继续进行继代并保存备用。

sentences.english: An alternative is to directly map the columns on the embeddable class.
sentences.chinese: 备用方法是直接将列映射到可嵌入类。

sentences.english: But if he obdurately resists change, we need a plan B.
sentences.chinese: 但如果他仍顽固拒绝变革，我们就需要一套备用方案。

sentences.english: Cut the duck meat, green and red capsicum into diamond shape, set aside.
sentences.chinese: 将鸭肉和青红椒切成同样大小的菱形块备用。

sentences.english: Make sure you have an extra cap and an extra pair of goggles with you.
sentences.chinese: 确认你时刻准备着备用的泳镜和泳帽。

definition: to cut up (into pieces)/to slice/to carve/to dice/to shred
chunks obtained by repeatedly cutting a vegetable diagonally and rotating the vegetable after each cut
to slice/slice/thin section of a specimen (for microscopic examination)
to peel/to remove the skin/to tare
